SEARCH
Package com.example.view

Class TablePromptOption

Object
TablePromptOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPrompt, IViewPage
public class TablePromptOption extends Object implements IPrompt, IViewPage
This class basically displays data in the form of a table. It implements both IPrompt and IViewPage to both display data and also take in the user's option if it is required

  • Constructor Details

    • TablePromptOption

      public TablePromptOption(String question, ArrayList<String> headers, ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> columns)
      constructor for the class
      Parameters:
      question - which is the statement or question displayed
      headers - which is the ArrayList of column titles for the table
      columns - which is the ArrayList of ArrayList of strings for the content of all the rows

  • Method Details

    • perform

      public void perform()
      Will display the data. It calculates the width of the columns and accordingly prints the borders. Furthermore, it also helps the text wrap to the next line nearly to prevent overflow and excessive stretching of the table for the sake of neatness and clarity
      Specified by:
      perform in interface IViewPage

    • startPrompt

      public void startPrompt()
      will begin the prompting process. this method can be called only if user input is required. if the table just needs to be displayed you don't need this method
      Specified by:
      startPrompt in interface IPrompt

    • getResult

      public String getResult()
      getter method to retrieve result
      Specified by:
      getResult in interface IPrompt
      Returns:
      the integer choice converted to a string
